testcase.classname: Add Product to Cart and Checkout
testcase.name: Add product to cart and checkout successfully after registering with valid details
testcase.system-out: Given User is on Homepage...................................................passed When User navigates to computer section and clicks on computer category.....passed And User sorts the products and apply filters...............................passed And User Adds item to cart and navigates to cart and checkout...............passed And User registers with valid details and checkout the product..............passed Then Order is placed successfully...........................................passed
